description: This file defines various Pydantic data models related to authentication, including request payloads, token structures, and user information, used in the backend API of a project.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: Request payload for password-based login, containing email and password.

classes.name: RefreshRequest
classes.description: Request payload for refreshing JWT tokens using a refresh token.

classes.name: GoogleLoginRequest
classes.description: Request payload for Google sign-in using an ID token.

classes.name: TokenPair
classes.description: Contains access and refresh tokens along with token type.

classes.name: TokenPayload
classes.description: Represents the decoded payload of a JWT token, including subject, type, expiry, and issued-at timestamps.

classes.name: AuthResponse
classes.description: Response containing authentication tokens and user profile information.

ctags.name: AuthResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class AuthResponse(PydBaseModel):$/

ctags.name: GoogleLoginRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class GoogleLoginRequest(PydBaseModel):$/

ctags.name: LoginRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class LoginRequest(PydBaseModel):$/

ctags.name: PydBaseModel
ctags.pattern: /^from pydantic import BaseModel as PydBaseModel$/

ctags.name: RefreshRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class RefreshRequest(PydBaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TokenPair
ctags.pattern: /^class TokenPair(PydBaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TokenPayload
ctags.pattern: /^class TokenPayload(PydBaseModel):$/

ctags.name: access_token
ctags.pattern: /^    access_token: str = Field(..., description="Short-lived access token used for API calls")$/

ctags.name: email
ctags.pattern: /^    email: EmailStr = Field(..., description="User email address")$/

ctags.name: exp
ctags.pattern: /^    exp: int = Field(..., description="Expiry timestamp (epoch seconds)")$/

ctags.name: iat
ctags.pattern: /^    iat: int = Field(..., description="Issued at timestamp (epoch seconds)")$/

ctags.name: id_token
ctags.pattern: /^    id_token: str = Field(..., description="Google ID token obtained on the client")$/

ctags.name: model_config
ctags.pattern: /^    model_config = ConfigDict(from_attributes=True)$/

ctags.name: model_config
ctags.pattern: /^    model_config = ConfigDict(from_attributes=True)$/

ctags.name: password
ctags.pattern: /^    password: str = Field(..., min_length=6, description="User password")$/

ctags.name: refresh_token
ctags.pattern: /^    refresh_token: str = Field(..., description="Long-lived refresh token for rotating tokens")$/

ctags.name: refresh_token
ctags.pattern: /^    refresh_token: str = Field(..., description="Valid refresh JWT token")$/

ctags.name: sub
ctags.pattern: /^    sub: str = Field(..., description="Subject identifier (User ID)")$/

ctags.name: token_type
ctags.pattern: /^    token_type: str = Field(default="bearer", description='Authorization token type; always "bea/

ctags.name: tokens
ctags.pattern: /^    tokens: TokenPair = Field(..., description="Access and refresh tokens")$/

ctags.name: type
ctags.pattern: /^    type: str = Field(..., description='Token type; either "access" or "refresh"')$/

ctags.name: user
ctags.pattern: /^    user: UserRead = Field(..., description="Authenticated user information")$/
